comment_body:
The idea for this story was simple: a couple is haunted by the ghost of their dead daughter. Instead of going for scares though, I decided to show how the two of them handled the situation and what toll it took on them.

If you enjoyed this story check out my [**author page**](https://rehnwriter.com/) and also check out all of my talented friends at [**r/TheCrypticCompendium**](https://www.reddit.com/r/TheCrypticCompendium/).
I sortoff saw it coming but I thought the wife was also dead
